name: Misty Jenkins
text: Best pizza I've had in a long time. The fresh crust is amazing!

name: AK Gordari
text: Traveling on business and came across this Pizza Inn! Haven't seen one of these in many years. Stopped by on my way back through. The place is old, but that didn't matter to me. I just wanted the pizza, and the pizza didn't disappoint! Pizza Inn still has the best crust ever! (Crispy Thin is the fav).

name: Miche M.
text: I will forever be a fan of Pizza Inn! Many of the locations that I use to frequent have closed down, but this one remains lol. The pizza buffet is definitely worth your money. There’s always a great variety of pizza, salad options and …More

name: Steven Busbee
text: good service, food was okay. I would go back. thanks

name: thesia cunningham
text: pizza was greasy and they cooked it too long...pizza was hard

name: Bryan Miller
text: Took over 5 rings to even answer the phone. When I arrived to pick up my order, I rang the bell and waited... A few minutes later an employee runs past the window. A couple of minutes later, another employee leaves out of the door right in front of me! Never again.

name: Marcia Sweet
text: I had forgotten how great this pizza was. Wonderful buffet. The buffet stayed fully stocked the whole time I was there, not once did they run out of pizza, unlike the other place down the road. Will definitely be back.

name: BigRobbo
text: All you can eat lunch buffet and salad bar is great. The staff is really nice & helpful. Reasonable prices.

name: Chris Parnell
text: Great place to eat!!! Friendly people and great food. Must try there peach cobbler pizza, it's the bomb.

name: Crystal Webb
text: Pizza was very tasty!! Staff was friendly and service was fast.

name: Shawn Brown
text: Great service and food!!!

name: David Mcgough
text: I would give it less than one star. If they could even manage to get your order right they will over charge you. This has got to be one of the worst pizza inns in Arkansas.

name: Chad Manz
text: Not recommended. I’ve had pizza at other Pizza Inn locations in my opinion this location’s pizza is not up to corporate standards solely based on the quality of the cheese. The cheese reminded me of the worst pizza I ever had from a place …More

name: Kim A
text: Great staff and good food

name: Mary Goodman
text: People that worked there never came by our table. The appetizer was the last thing to come out. They tried to have us pay the bill three times.

name: Cohere
text: Good food, good people. Been eating here since I was a kid.

name: WarmWeenies Doxie Sweaters
text: Really good pizza. Friendly and fast. Easy drive through or dine in.

name: Reilly Hayles

name: Edward Ervin
text: Pizza Inn has always been my favorite all time pizza... thanks McGee Arkansas for having one along our way!

text: The Sunday buffet was less than desirable and was told they would not be putting anything else out. Took over 5 minutes to get our drinks after we sat down. Staff was so busy standing around the register talking and laughing to pay …More
